title: Most popular social media sites in Norway 2019 , by platform
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 10 number of Platforms.
Platform Facebook has the highest Share of respondents and Tumblr has the lowest Share of respondents.
The lowest value at Platform Tumblr is 41.5x times less than the highest value at Facebook.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 83.0 is found at Platform Facebook and the minimum is found at Tumblr where Platform is 2.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 10 number of Platforms.
Platform Facebook has the highest Share of respondents and Tumblr has the lowest Share of respondents.
The lowest value at Platform Tumblr is 41.5x times less than the highest value at Facebook.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of respondents in each Platform on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Tumblr.
The second highest Share of respondents is appeared to be the Platform Snapchat.
Platform Facebook has 41.5 times more Share of respondents than Platform Tumblr which is has the lowest.
The Platform Facebook has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Snapchat, and YouTube. Down to the Platform Tumblr which is the lowest.
Platform Pinterest, and Whatsapp have a similar Share of respondents that is 16.0.
The Platform Facebook tends to be 2.43 percent higher than average.
The Share of respondents is 342.0 if we add up values of all Platforms.
